review_text: Use your favorite soda to make great slushies.  No diet though. It doesn't work. Needs sugar to keep it loose.  My kids love it!!!!You could even use Lemonade flavored with sugar or for adults frozen Marguarita's.  We love our Ice Cream Maker!
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
